description:
Forget about the asphalt of the metropolis and the shiny city cars — here you will find only primitive rage and real demolition derby! To win this infernal mess, you need a powerful extreme car, an engine instead of a heart and high-octane gasoline instead of blood!

Defeat enemies and bosses and discover new cars and destroy everything and everything in its path!

▪ A bunch of different amazing derby arenas;
▪ Large selection of cars — there is even a monster truck!
▪ Deadly dynamics and atmosphere of survival races!
▪ Rhythmic music will make you crush your opponents!
name: Derby Racing: Xtreme Driver
